description:
A titan lays seige to a small fishing village.  An evil lord steals a man`s beautiful wife.  Friends of a lord plot to take back his money from a fox haunting a graveyard.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dandarabocchi to Oowaraji / Esugata Nyoubou / Fukuro no Kitsune
Dandarabochi and the Giant Sandals / The Painted Wife / The Fox in the Bag
ダンダラボッチと大わらじ / 絵姿女房 / 袋のキツネ
